body.raw:
Welcome to the Badget documentation.

Badget is a community driven, open source personal finance tracker.
Think of it as the open source version to https://copilot.money

<Callout>

The documentation is still a work in progress. [We welcome contributions!](https://github.com/projectx-codehagen/Badget)\
You can follow updates on Twitter [@CodeHagen](https://twitter.com/CodeHagen).

</Callout>
